name: Silent Santa 2
description:
Silent Santa 2 is a next part of the Silent Santa. But for now, you will able to fly with your dwarfs in a big land/ city. Santa's main mission is making tasks till end of the night! Game is available for every age category. It's just fun.

Enjoy this game and MERRY CHRISTMAS 2015 & HAPPY NEW YEAR 2016 wishes you Matts Creations!

Check the last Silent Santa version: Silent Santa 3
